Plot: Administrator of a Fitness-Club Kostya thinks that having a woman taller than 180sm by a man's side is a symbol of his prosperity and success. But he can only dream of having a 180sm beauty...
Title: Ot 180 i vyshe
Actors: Darya Korepanova, Ekaterina Guseva, Ekaterina Teyze, Ekaterina Malikova
